name: The Forest City
description:
Please Before Playing The Game Just Read

The Summary And Release Note To make
The Game More Enjoyable Thanks. 

This Is a Showcase for My Map Called The Forest
City. There are Many Ways To discover This
Map But The Way I like Is To First Start
From The Tree House After Than Go
Straight, Follow The Lights You Will End up
Finding Something Cool. After That, You
Need To Get To The Bridge Then Climb Up
The Hill After That You Have To Take A
Right And Enter The Ruin. Then Go To The
Garage And Get The Car Go Right. It's A
Mystery For You Hope You Find It.
Enjoy, Thank You For Playing

Drive The Car On the Red Blinking Parking Block To Get Of The Car

Controls: Press Left Shift To Sprint
Press V To Switch Between First Person View Or Third Person View
Press Shift While Sitting In The Car to Lower Your Speed
Press Shift After Getting Off The Car To Normalize Your Speed
